articles.title: Young Britons Face Worst Jobs Market Since Covid After Tax Hike
articles.summary: Britons looking for their first jobs face the worst hiring drought since the depths of the Covid pandemic, as the rise in artificial intelligence and higher employment costs distort career opportunities.
articles.translated_title: Young Britons Face Worst Jobs Market Since Covid After Tax Hike
articles.translated_summary: Britons looking for their first jobs face the worst hiring drought since the depths of the Covid pandemic, as the rise in artificial intelligence and higher employment costs distort career opportunities.

articles.title: Elon Musk accuses Apple and OpenAI of stifling AI competition in antitrust lawsuit
articles.summary: Elon Musk on Monday targeted Apple and OpenAI in an antitrust lawsuit alleging that the iPhone maker and the ChatGPT maker are teaming up to thwart competition in artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Elon Musk accuses Apple and OpenAI of stifling AI competition in antitrust lawsuit
articles.translated_summary: Elon Musk on Monday targeted Apple and OpenAI in an antitrust lawsuit alleging that the iPhone maker and the ChatGPT maker are teaming up to thwart competition in artificial intelligence.

articles.title: First lady Melania Trump will head effort to teach next generation about AI
articles.summary: First lady Melania Trump will lead the Presidential Artificial Intelligence Challenge to inspire children and teachers¬†to embrace AI technology and help accelerate innovation in the field.

articles.title: Andreessen Horowitz Joins $100 Million Effort to Shape AI Regulation
articles.summary: Venture capital firm Andreessen Horowitz is joining other major Silicon Valley investors in backing a new $100 million political network that seeks to influence US artificial intelligence policy, deepening the tech industry‚Äôs involvement in politics under President Donald Trump.
articles.translated_title: Andreessen Horowitz Joins $100 Million Effort to Shape AI Regulation
articles.translated_summary: Venture capital firm Andreessen Horowitz is joining other major Silicon Valley investors in backing a new $100 million political network that seeks to influence US artificial intelligence policy, deepening the tech industry‚Äôs involvement in politics under President Donald Trump.

articles.title: Elon Musk alleges 'anticompetitive scheme' in xAI's Apple, OpenAI lawsuit
articles.summary: Elon Musk's xAI is suing Apple and OpenAI over alleged favoritism in artificial intelligence apps. It accused Apple and OpenAI of an "anticompetitive scheme" and alleged the two companies "colluded."
articles.translated_title: Elon Musk alleges 'anticompetitive scheme' in xAI's Apple, OpenAI lawsuit
articles.translated_summary: Elon Musk's xAI is suing Apple and OpenAI over alleged favoritism in artificial intelligence apps. It accused Apple and OpenAI of an "anticompetitive scheme" and alleged the two companies "colluded."

articles.title: Saudi's Humain to launch data centers with US chips in early 2026, Bloomberg News reports
articles.summary: Humain, Saudi Arabia's new artificial intelligence company, has begun construction of its first data centers in the kingdom, and plans to bring them online in early 2026 using semiconductors imported from the U.S., Bloomberg News reported on Monday.
articles.translated_title: Saudi's Humain to launch data centers with US chips in early 2026, Bloomberg News reports

articles.title: Alphabet Stock Hits New All-Time High On AI, Cloud Momentum
articles.summary: Shares of Google parent Alphabet hit a new all-time high Monday. The stock is being buoyed by a string of positive developments in its artificial intelligence and cloud computing divisions.
articles.translated_title: Alphabet Stock Hits New All-Time High On AI, Cloud Momentum
